channel.title: Devolution NPC Spawning
channel.description:
Hello, I am using the Devolution source; I have spawned an NPC but it's facing the other way and when I talk to it, it only shows the back of it's head, how do I turn it around to face me?
Thanks for your help.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 13, 2008, 02:13:47 pm[/size][hr]BUMP
